graphql.query:
query search($token: String!, $params: String){
    search (token: $token, params: $params){
        stats {totalHits searchEngineTimeInMillis searchEngineRoundTripTimeInMillis searchProcessingTimeInMillis}
        documentList {
            id
            displayName
            numberOfHits
            documents {
                _id
                _type
                acl
                added_time
                asset_type
                assetsource
                author
                channel
                description
                description_external
                display_language
                doc_date_time
                docid
                downloads
                env
                format
                industries_taxonomy
                language
                main_content_hash
                main_content_size
                main_content_url
                media_type
                ml_url
                mlassettype
                mmid
                pdf_preview_size
                pdf_preview_standard_size
                pdf_preview_standard_url
                pdf_preview_url
                png_highpreview1278_size
                png_highpreview1278_url
                png_highpreview800_size
                png_highpreview800_url
                png_highpreview_size
                png_highpreview_url
                png_lowpreview_size
                png_lowpreview_url
                processing_time
                processingtime
                publication_designation
                publish_status
                rightsmanaged
                security_context
                security_level
                tab
                taxonomy
                tcmid
                thumbnail
                thumbnail_url
                thumbnailurl
                title
                url                
            }
            pagination{
                offset
                hitsPerPage
                firstPage {displayName selected query}
                previousPage {displayName selected query}
                nextPage {displayName selected query}
                pages {displayName selected query}
            }
            sortOptions {displayName selected query}
        }
        facets {
            id
            displayName
            selectionType
            multipleLevels
            filters { displayName selected query count
                children { displayName selected query count
                    children { displayName selected query count 
                        children { displayName selected query count 
                            children { displayName selected query count 
                                children { displayName selected query count 
                                    children { displayName selected query count 
                                        children { displayName selected query count }
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
